vidis.sim.components
Class SimulatorComponentFactory

java.lang.Object
  vidis.sim.components.SimulatorComponentFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
ComponentFactoryInt, NodeConnectObservable<NodeConnectListener>, NodeJoinObservable<NodeJoinListener>, NodeLeaveObservable<NodeLeaveListener>, ReceivePacketObservable<ReceivePacketListener>, SendPacketObservable<SendPacketListener>
Direct Known Subclasses:
DemoFactory
public abstract class SimulatorComponentFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements ComponentFactoryInt

basic factory class; this class knows about the concrete components and constructors NOTE FOR MODULE WRITERS: USE THIS CLASS TO IMPLEMENT A NEW MODULE FACTORY!

Author:
dominik
